name: TalkingLucy
0:
”Alexa, start talking lucy”
”Alexa, play talking lucy”
”Alexa, launch talking lucy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talking lucy
des: Your new best friend is here! Talking Lucy! Play with Lucy everyday, take care of her as your own pet. Teach her new things by talking to her everyday. Lucy will repeat everything that you say.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
